Imports
```{r}
library(jsonlite)
library(readxl)
library(readr)
# library(dplyr)
```


Reading the data
```{r}
orient_prof_unb_json <- fromJSON("orientacoes_professores_unb.json")
dir_gru_pesq_unb_xls <- read_excel("diretorio_grupos_pesquisa_unb.xls")
tes_diss_unb_json <- fromJSON("teses_dissertacoes_unb.json")
pub_rep_oasis_txt <- read_tsv("publicacoes_repositorio_oasis.txt")
```

Showing data structure
```{r}
names(orient_prof_unb_json)
names(dir_gru_pesq_unb_xls)
names(tes_diss_unb_json)
names(pub_rep_oasis_txt)
```
